name: Bundle Iron of Studs
description: A collection of iron studs and reinforcing spikes designed for adding protective elements to armor and clothing. These reliable components provide affordable defensive enhancement for leather armor, belts, and bracers.
properties: Standard material protection with no special effects

name: Bundle of Steel Studs
description: A collection of steel studs and reinforcing spikes designed for adding protective elements to armor and clothing. These durable components offer improved defensive capabilities over iron alternatives.
properties: Standard material protection with no special effects

name: Bundle of True Steel Studs
description: A collection of true steel studs and reinforcing spikes crafted for superior armor enhancement. These masterwork components deliver exceptional protective qualities through advanced metallurgical techniques.
properties: +1 physical mitigation when crafted into armor. Adds +2 damage and +1 extra damage to brawling attacks when crafted into boots or gloves

name: Bundle of Starsteel Studs
description: A collection of starsteel studs and reinforcing spikes forged from legendary celestial metal. These otherworldly components channel divine protection through their supernatural properties.
properties: +3 physical mitigation when crafted into armor. Adds +3 damage and +3 extra damage to brawling attacks when crafted into boots or gloves
